profile.name: Anthony Fu
profile.headline: Staff Software Engineer at Vercel | Nuxt Core Team Member | Open Source Contributor & Developer Tools Specialist
profile.about: I am a Staff Software Engineer at Vercel, dedicated to enhancing the developer experience and contributing to the Nuxt.js ecosystem. With a passion for open-source and modern web technologies, I focus on building robust, scalable tools that empower developers worldwide. I believe in continuously pushing the boundaries of what's possible, always navigating towards new challenges and innovative solutions.
